Subjects: laments; Christ, Passion of; Adam, creation and fall of
_description: Lament for Original Sin in relation to Passion of Christ — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Alas moche wes þat senningeþat to al mankende was
                    damninge
CULIi38.Note:
Written in margin beside sermon De Passione Cristi, ff.
                        78v-80.
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 7.
